title: Clash-A-Mana Haqqında
description: Clash-A-Mana real vaxt kart döyüşü arenasıdır. Burada strategiya və taktika ilə rəqiblərinizi məğlub edə bilərsiniz.

sections.heading: Oyun Qaydaları
sections.content: Hər oyunçu 8 kart və maksimum 2 büyü kartından ibarət komanda yaradır və Mana resursları ilə kartlarını meydana çıxarır.
list: Hər kartın özünəməxsus xüsusiyyətləri var
Mana ilə kartlar aktiv edilir
Enerji ilə büyülər aktiv edilir
Strategiya quraraq rəqibi məğlub edin

sections.heading: Kart Növləri
list: Common - Adi kartlar

sections.heading: Əsas Xüsusiyyətlər
list: Health - The total amount of life your card has. When it reaches zero, your character dies.
Shield - A protective shield that absorbs 70 percent of incoming damage.
Damage - The amount of harm dealt to an enemy per hit or action.
Attack Speed - How fast your card performs attacks within a given time.
Range - The maximum distance from which your card attacks or uses abilities.
Speed - How fast your card moves across the game world.
D.P.S. - Damage per second. The average damage your card deals each second over time.
Critical Damage - The extra damage dealt when a critical hit occurs.
Critical Chance - The percentage chance for an attack to become a critical hit.
Life Steal - A mechanic where a portion of dealt damage restores your health.
Life Steal Chance - The probability that an attack triggers life steal.
Damage Reduction - A stat that lowers incoming damage before it affects health.
Dodge - A chance-based mechanic that avoids incoming attacks completely.

sections.heading: Əlavə Xüsusiyyətlər
list: Heal - An effect that restores health to a card over time or instantly.
Slow - A debuff that reduces a card’s movement speed or attack speed for a duration.
Burn - A damage over time effect that deals fire damage at fixed intervals.
Poison - A damage over time effect that deals toxic damage over a period and often weakens the target.
Silence - A status effect that prevents cards from using abilities or special skills for a duration.
Stat Reduction - A debuff that lowers an enemy’s stats, such as health or damage output.
Blind - A status effect that reduces an enemy’s vision, accuracy, or chance to hit.
Curse - A debuff that increases the amount of damage an enemy receives.
